body.name: MOUNTUP Height Adjustable Electric Standing Desk Whole-Piece, 48 x 24 Inches Quick Assembly Sit Stand Desk, Stand Up Desk with Memory Controller, Ergonomic Desk, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 17 hrs 48 mins
features: Seamless Surface: The one-piece desktop is free of seam breaks for a completely smooth surface. 48"x24" eco-friendly desktop offers ample workspace for a variety of monitor and laptop setups along with important work materials, supplies, and decor.

Smooth Height Adjustment: Easily switch between different heights ranging from 29.1" to 48". Powered by an electric lift mechanism, our standing desk offers quiet operation to ensure minimal distractions.

Solid Construction: The sturdy steel frame and wood desktop of adjustable desk allow 154lbs weight capacity. Monitors, books and other supplies will be held securely on the sit to stand desk without any issues.

Quick & Easy Assembly: Pre-assembled crossbeam simplify the setup process, freeing up time so you can get back to what matters most. Equipped with all the parts needed to get the desk setup in 15 minutes!

Intelligent Control Panel: The controller provides two programmable memory modes, which enables a customized comfortable office experience. Save two desired heights and switch postures with single tap of a button.
Please Note: MOUNTUP standing desk are covered by 5-year warranty for the frame and 2-year warranty for the motor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great new work desk
reviews.reviewText: I have been wanting to try a standing desk but all the ones I seen were super expensive and I was concerned about spending too much on one to just not use it. I bought this on prime day and it also had a coupon so I got it for a good reasonable price where if I ended up not liking the standing part of it I didn't spend a lot of money to try it out. It's worth the full price in my opinion.Putting it together was really easy. You do need an wrench (adjustable or a set with the size needed) to put it together. It comes with an Allen wrench and a small screw driver but I ended up using a normal sized one I have at home. The motor comes attached and hooked up, all you need to do is plug it into the control box once you get it installed. I think it took me maybe 30 minutes to complete the setup.Sturdiness is there. I don't feel like it is wobbly at all and I adjust the desk up and down at least once during the day as I am not used to standing all day just yet and need to switch. I have 2 monitors, a laptop, keyboard, mouse and a docking station all on it and nothing shifts moving it up or down.Desktop is like any modern desk top that is on the cheaper end and made out of pressed wood. I personally don't have a problem with it and at this price point you can't expect it to be top quality oak anyway. It's a sturdy top and have not had any issues out of it. It holds everything I need it to hold with no issues and works perfectly.The controls are easy to use and has two memory settings that can easily be changed.Overall I recommend this to anyone wanting to try a standing desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product & Wonderful Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: The desk is really beautiful and it moves up and down with ease. I’d spent a great deal of time researching similar stand up desks on Amazon. Many had a split top with a seam. This one did had a single top and had wonderful reviews. Assembly was easy however one screw went through the top. I contacted customer service and explained the situation on their firm on Amazon. A follow up email requested that I provide the order information and a photo of our issue. They promptly responded by email that they’d send a new top. They sent a new desk, tracking information and a reminder to check the frame for rubber gaskets to prevent the same issue from happening again. They even suggested we send photos if unsure of what we’re looking for. We have not had a chance to assemble the new desk yet.I highly recommend purchasing this product. Quality product at a nice price point and excellent customer service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Standing Desk
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent desk. It was easy to put together (about 45 minutes for my wife and I). The instructions are clear and concise. It is very sturdy at any height. The motor is very quiet and the desk looks good. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lift mechanism failed on first use
reviews.reviewText: We have a similar desk from Amazon that we've been happy with for the past year, so we decided to give this one a try since it was on sale. I opened the box and assembled the desk today. As shown in the attached pics, during assembly one of the the legs was clearly sitting lower on the frame than the other, causing the desk to be slightly out of level.But I finished the assembly hoping that the legs would calibrate to a uniform height after going through a raise/lower cycle, or at least that the uneven legs wouldn't significantly affect the functionality of the desk. I followed the instructions to reset the lifter control and then raised the desk to it's top height. The desk raised fairly smoothly, sounded as expected, and seemed pretty stable at top height. I kept my level on the desktop to see if the leg height self-corrected upon being fully raised. It didn't.I then lowered the desk. Again it was fairly smooth coming down but had a faint but distinct thudding sound every few seconds as it lowered. I then raised the desk all the way up a 2nd time and upon reaching nearly full height one leg completely collapsed within itself. I had to hold that collapsed side up manually to be able to lower the working side back down. I inspected the leg to see if there was anything visibly wrong with it and tried again to raise it to no avail.Needless to say, since at least one of the legs can't even support the weight of the desktop, this desk can't support 154 lbs as advertised. If you give this desk a try, I strongly advise that you run it through an appropriate stress test to make sure it can raise/lower properly and support weight before you put valuable or fragile items on it, such as a computer and monitor or two. Thankfully I only had my level on the desk when it unexpectedly collapsed during setup.In addition to the broken leg, the desktop also has some color blemishes along the top edge, especially on the corners. I included a pic to show that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build
reviews.reviewText: I’m super impressed with this desk especially at this price point. As you can see I’m a very cozy gamer haha, and this desk is perfect for for the chair that I use, it is also very easy to assemble I didn’t have any trouble what so ever. I like that this desk came with cable ties that stick to the bottom side of the desk to hide those pesky wires. 10/10 highly recommend. I will say you can definitely hear the motor when it’s moving but it’s nothing my games won’t overpower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars one piece table top
reviews.reviewText: great for the price I paid. does the job. up down and memory buttons don't respond all the time but for 100 bucks I'm not complaining. highlighting that table top is one piece I believe others in Amazon are 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast adjustment and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The desk raises and lowers amazingly and the top is nice looking aswell. Even came with 3M tape on the cable management zipties. It arrived with a slight crack in the top but I am in contact with support currentlyUpdate: The desk top is being replaced free of charge. Definitely buy this desk
